TopicTitle: Unable to gain -any- science in carreer mode.

Articles.Content: I have had this odd issue, and I am not sure what to send or do to try to find out, so I am needing help, but Somehow, I have a mod, or mods, that are conflicting and making it -impossible- to get science, of any kind, be it transferring, but more importantly, being brought back to KSC gets me none, and I don't even get science rewards for doing missions.

That is a very odd problem. Cant say I have ran into that before or read about anything similar. Im no modder or able to look at code easily but if you post a log I am sure some one who has that experience would be able to look at it.
I will try to get a log to upload, by going, launching a pod, taking a crew report, then returning with the recover vessel to try to get it, and copy debug log to post..

Interesting, the debug log lists this error when I return to the base...

[Error]: Cannot find a Module of typename 'StnSciScenario'

[Error]: ScenarioModule is null.

[Log]: 1/16/2015 6:16:54 PM,KerbalAlarmClock,Contracts System Ready

[Log]: [VesselRecovery]: Untitled Space Craft recovered At LaunchPad. Recovery Value: 100.0%

Several lines up I found this

[Log]: [KS] OnLoad

[Error]: Cannot find a Module of typename 'MissionControllerData'

[Error]: ScenarioModule is null.

[Log]: 1/16/2015 6:16:54 PM,KerbalAlarmClock,No Alarms to Load
